title: Low/unstable fps requires help!
body:
Hi, this has come to a point where i'm annoyed enough to think its a settings issue and im not on the sweet spot.

I know im on a budget laptop, however my budget laptop is better than my old 2008 pc which could run LoL on high settings at a stable smooth 60fps... But now im reduced to at worst 15-at best 70/80... on average around 25-40 (bounces).

I've tried googling options but the options that come up are for an outdated method which has changed, 
i run AMD graphics (AMD Radeon R3 w/e built in) amd quadcore 1.8ghz 4gb ram... 

Now we have "radeon settings" and a gaming tab, i've tried to match it as best i can to garenalol and doing customs also to fiddle with ingame settings,

is there anything else i can do also? another settings page within league and custom turn off some graphics if required to reduce stress? 

It's not internet related, i play every game on around 15ms at worst 21ms without a random spike from ISP.

also; there used to be an fps counter on screen and now there's not?!?! 

I just wanna start doing ranked games and i don't want to risk it {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Try running through the [Low FPS troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting) support article, let me know if anything there helps out.

doing a CC clean at present, i was following that already and fixed a fair few issues already in game, last 3-4 have been fairly stable and consistant with fps. Also seems autoupdated drivers, werent autoupdating, was 4 versions behind. Registry had a fair bit of clutter to it, going through a scan now for the cleaner and let it process then trying another game out, however arams were running this morning at 60fps with the odd drop down to 50ish

Glad the issue is resolved.

See you on the rift,
Seph
